items.title: Gauff wins two brilliant points on way through to Australian Open second round
items.summary: Third seed Coco Gauff wins two brilliants during a dominant 6-2 6-3 first-round win against Kamilla Rakhimova at the Australian Open.

items.title: 'Ups and downs' as Swiatek begins bid for history with win
items.summary: Iga Swiatek's bid to complete the career Grand Slam gets off to an underwhelming start as she struggles past Chinese qualifier Yuan Yue in the Australian Open first round.

items.title: Chelsea open to selling Fernandez - Monday's gossip

items.summary: Glasgow Warriors 28-3 Champions Cup defeat of Saracens shows Franco Smith's side are an elite side who are contenders for two titles this season, writes Tom English.

items.title: 'I'll pick myself up' - sobbing Jones among Australian Open retirements
items.summary: Injury wrecks Francesca Jones' hopes of earning a first Australian Open main-draw win, while Marina Stakusic is taken off court on a wheelchair on day two.

items.title: 'They've done it again!' - watch Bears force overtime against Rams
items.summary: Chicago Bears quarterback Caleb Williams produces a superb touchdown pass to Cole Kmet in the final seconds of regulation time to force overtime against the Los Angeles Rams in their NFC Divisional Round game.

items.title: Rams hold off Bears fightback in overtime classic
items.summary: Watch highlights as the Los Angeles Rams hold off another Chicago Bears comeback to win 20-17 in overtime and advance to the NFC Conference Championship game.

items.title: Celtic beat Auchinleck in Scottish Cup
items.summary: Watch highlights as Celtic overcome a brave backs-to-the-wall effort from sixth-tier Auchinleck Talbot to reach the last 16 of the Scottish Cup.

items.title: Lava Blaze Duo 3 debuts with dual screens and 5,000mAh battery
items.summary: India-based smartphone brand Lava has launched its latest handset in the country. The Lava Blaze Duo 3 features a secondary rear display, much like the original Blaze Duo that made its debut in December 2024. The Blaze Duo 3 features a 1.6-inch AMOLED touch display on the rear that supports severalâ€¦

items.title: The story of 'Ned' and the County Antrim Shield

items.title: Medvedev wins at major for first time in 370 days

items.title: Carrick gave fans 'taste' of Ferguson era - Rooney
items.summary: Wayne Rooney says Man Utd's younger fans got a "taste of what it was like under Sir Alex Ferguson" in the win over Man City - and hopes it is a glimpse of what is to come under Michael Carrick.

items.title: Infinix Note Edge in for review
items.summary: Infinix has entered the trendy slim space with the freshly unveiled Infinix Note Edge. Now, this isn't one of those sub-6mm slim phones, but at 7.2mm, it's still thinner than the majority of phones out there. Infinix says this is the first phone to feature MediaTek's Dimensity 7100 5G chip. The Infâ€¦

items.title: Infinix Note Edge is now official with Dimensity 7100, 7.2mm thickness
items.summary: The Infinix Note Edge that we teased a few days ago is now fully official. The phone is 7.2mm thick, weighs 185g, and is powered by MediaTek's recently announced Dimensity 7100 SoC, paired with up to 8GB of RAM. There's a curved 6.78-inch screen with "1.5K" resolution, 120Hz refresh rate, 2,800Hz tâ€¦
